entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
